basics.name: David Aizenberg
basics.label: DevOps Engineer
basics.summary: Solution oriented engineer with hands on approach, Uncompromising will to learn and “can do” attitude.

skills.name: Linux
keywords: Software Management and Packaging (deb packages, snapcraft, init systems)
CI/CD and Configuration Management (CircleCI, Drone.io, Ansible)
Troubleshooting and Tracing (ftrace, strace, tcpdump, perf)
Load Balancing and Caching Proxies (nginx, haproxy, traefik)
Log and dump analysis (awk, sed, grep)

skills.name: Software Development
keywords: On-going support and maintenance of legacy code bases (php, js, python)

highlights: Introduction of various workflow improvements(Code reviews, version control, automation)
Live User Data migration from legacy apps onto a new stack

work.summary: Developed Software as a Service product.  Including choice of technology stack, platform, setting up infrastructure, and developing new features.
highlights: Full Stack Development of SaaS product with MEAN Stack and Meteor framework
Code Reviews and management of two working students

work.summary: Deployment and maintenance of servers, personal computers and peripheral devices.  On-going maintenance, upgrades and deployments of client servers and workstations, including Linux, Windows and Mac OS X workstations and Linux, Windows servers.
highlights: On-going maintenance, updates and assistance with Linux, Windows and Mac OS X workstations
Deployment and maintenance of Linux Servers
Education and implementation of basic security measures, such as firewalls, private networks
